column5: Ah ,you must of missed it Bill.LOL
Not much happened over my way
sorry bud, we were in caledonia. gorgeous weather. windy and that helped push a few balls a little farther then they would have gone lol, but not a drop of rain and it kept the mosquitoos away!
Hang on boys and girls...here she comes. http://www.theweathernetwork.com/weather/maps/on_s/caon0638?ref=qlink_obs_radar
YIKES! hope your all safe.
Somethings coming down from southern Georgian Bay as well, towards Barrie http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/radar/index_e.html?id=WKR
Thanks ehg...edited the post title to reflect the new info.
On the bright side it is supposed to be a BEAUTIFUL weekend.  Hope all are safe during the storm, with the crazy weather we've seen the last few weeks you just don't know what to expect.
yeah i've been keeping my eyes on the weekend. were renting a cottage on rice and so far so good. hope it stays nice in gbay for you aswell.
Just walked outside from the office over here in Grand Island, NY.  The sky is getting very dark and the wind has died.  Very humid outside and you can hear thunder in the distance.

Lots of rain and gusting winds here in Penetang.  3 or 4 hydro trucks sitting on the back road between Penetang and Midland waiting to see what happens I guess.  Lots of water on the roads.  Storm blew through the area just as fast as it came in.  I was driving from Midland to Penetang and at times the rain was coming down with gusting winds so heavy I couldn't see the road.  Tom
Just went through midland....heavy heavy rain and high winds...radar says were okay now
Thanks guys.  I was sunny in barrie a few minues ago.  I read this post..  Then went outside to roll my windows up, and now it's just starting to rain.

Contimplated whether to head out,so I did.Shore fished all day and left the canoe on the roof.Weather pattern didnt look promising.Found a nice muskie area in the niagara region,close to shore Had a follower from shore,Pike or ski .It was one of them for sure.
Bright, hot & sunny north of P'Boro, course that could change real fast too.

that was an intense front that rolled through port here...i dont think ive ever seen more ominous clouds before ....it became extremely humid right after the storm but has recently dropped in temp again and it looks like we might be getting another hit ....  i love EXTREME weather...!!!!!!
Yes, keep an eye west of you, it's moving East at a pretty good clip and showing nasty on the King City radar.
As you can see In my post Rick,it came through here.Just rain right now and nice and cool,but calling for more later.

we just had high winds here ripped my boat cover and it almost blew away seems as it blew around it picked up a muskie lure I tried to grab the cover and got the hook in the finger..big hook big ouchie I should know better and put them away once they dry out
Just started to rain a few moments ago east of Bobcaygeon...hang in there Lew...you're next...
Hit Lindsay at about 4:55 it is now on the West side of Peterborough. hit us with heavy rain, high winds, dust devils. You wouldn't know there had even been a storm now 5:24 pm. Stay safe all!
we got hamered at around 3 p.m. out this way.... crazy wind, the lights were flickering, trees looked like they were going to uproot... but it came and went quick... 1/2 hour tops...
My daughter and I are heading out in the am for some KL fishing I hope these storms have not shut the fish down that would suck. Hope everyone made it through fine
Thought you were gonna say it swung the muskie lure out onto the lake and caught you a nice big muskie  Sorry about your finger.  Joey

I spoke too soon....  By 4:30 the black clouds rolled in, the thunder rumbled and the winds picked up    It rained heavy for about 15 minutes    But thru it all, the old girl kept the home fires burning    It's now 6:00 and the sun is poking thru the clouds again.  Ya gotta luv Ontario weather
had clouds in hamilton... havent seen any rain or winds... its actually been bright and sunny for most of the afternoon. which is good... cause i have baseball tonite!!
wheres yoru game darrell?
Not much here in Barrie, a bit of rain, a bit of wind and that's about it.
